import React from 'react' import HeartEmpty from '../images/heart_empty.gif' // import HeartFull from '../images/heart_full.gif' import '../styles/CharityCard.css'; export default class CharityCard extends React.Component{ state = { moreInfo: false } showMoreInfo = e => { if (this.state.moreInfo === false){ this.setState({ moreInfo: true }) }else{ this.setState({ moreInfo: false }) } } hideMoreInfo = e => { this.setState({ moreInfo: false }) } charityMission = () => { const mission = this.props.charity.mission return mission.replace(//gi,' ') } render(){ return(
{ this.hideMoreInfo(); this.props.onClick();}}>x
